item.description:
You are cordially invited to... A Meet Up Click and Shoot at the Festival! We will be meeting at the 7 Hill Camera Club Table at 11:30 and then off to shoot the event. Never been to the festival- here's some info for you! I hope you'll join in the fun!

stART on the Street's BLOCK PARTY...

...Central Massachusetts' largest cultural street festival

Sunday September 21, 2008


featuring over 250 artists and crafters, bands, performers, food court and MORE!

In 2008, stART throws a BLOCK PARTY, a massive interactive impromptu cardboard city flooding the street with shared art!

The September festival is the headliner event attracting over 20,000 attendees, 250+ artists and crafters, 20+ performers, youth activities, food court and more at this one-day, FREE festival that is literally "on the street".


Sunday September 21, 2008, 11am - 5pm, Park Avenue, between Highland and Pleasant Streets, Worcester, MA
Rain date: Sunday September 28, 2008

Artists, crafters, bands, performers, food vendors, organizations - check out http://www.startonthe...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting at the 7 Hill Camera Club Table

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Click and Shoot: stART on the Street's BLOCK PARTY
